name: Stars (prototype)
description:
Please message me if the Mac version doesn't work, I don't have a Mac to test it on.

Stars is a small prototype designed to be an immersive environment. 

Using lots of blues and yellow accents, it should draw you in and keep you engaged with simple gameplay elements.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

- WASD to move

- Collide to Interact

- Space to jump

- Move mouse to move camera

- Escape to Exit game

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

CREDITS AND ATTRIBUTIONS:

Main Track: 

Soft Mysterious Harp Loop by VWolfdog / Jordy Hake : https://opengameart.org/content/soft-mysterious-harp-loop 

SFX:

Ocean Sound Effect from Pixabay - jackmichaelking

Nighttime Cricket Sound Effect by Pixabay - sengjinn

Wind in Trees Sound Effect by Pixabay - SoundsForYou

Shimmer Sound Effect by Pixabay - Tarkavor 

Font:

EatDay Font : https://www.dafont.com/eatday.font

All rights go to their respective owners, please check out their other work as well!
